column5: Was thinking about taking a few drifts in the morning............. Anyone know how the water is looking after fridays rain?
It was still pretty high in Pickering today. It should be a little better by the morning though.  I was debating the same thing.
High and fast, tomorrow will be better, not 100%;but better
Still lots of run off from snow. Should be better by Monday am. Good luck too any Steel hunters tomorrow.  I should be out MON or Tuesday for sure.  Cheers AL
